summary: The accelerators package defines a unified abstraction layer for hardware back‑ends in Lightning Fabric. It provides an abstract accelerator base, concrete implementations for CPU, NVIDIA CUDA GPUs, Apple Silicon MPS GPUs, and XLA/TPU devices, as well as a registry to discover, register, and manage these accelerator classes. Each implementation handles device discovery, availability checks, parallel device configuration, precision settings, memory handling, and lifecycle setup/teardown.
business_intent: Enable Lightning Fabric users to run deep‑learning workloads seamlessly across diverse compute resources—CPUs, NVIDIA GPUs, Apple Silicon GPUs, and TPUs—by offering a consistent API for device management, parallel execution, and resource cleanup, thereby simplifying deployment and scaling of models in production and research environments.
